page.title: 15Clubs in Longdon
page.content: A{playgroup} is held on two mornings each week during term time. { Guides and Brownies} meet each week, once a week. The{ Church Womens Fellowship} hold a monthly meeting and the{Parish Council meet about 6 times a year. All these activities take place in the village hall. The{"Phoenix Association" }is for the {pensioners. }An outing in the summer and Christmas party are organised for them. The{school}has a{P.T.A.,}but it has a greater socialising than fund-raising function, the school being efficiently and economically run. The local youngsters with mobility go to Tewkesbury, Gloucester, Chelt- enham or Worcester for 'local' enter- tainment.
